TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OleDbCommandBuilder extends System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder
Public NotInheritable Class OleDbCommandBuilder Inherits DbCommandBuilder
public ref class OleDbCommandBuilder sealed : System::Data::Common::DbCommandBuilder
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OleDbCommandBuilder extends System.ComponentModel.Component
Public NotInheritable Class OleDbCommandBuilder Inherits Component
public ref class OleDbCommandBuilder sealed : System::ComponentModel::Component

summary.span: 自动生成用于协调对 的更改与关联数据库的单表命令。

span.span: Automatically generates single-table commands that are used to reconcile changes made to a with the associated database.

summary.span: 无法继承此类。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会自动生成将对 所做的更改与关联的数据源进行协调所需的 SQL 语句。The does not automatically generate the SQL statements required to reconcile changes made to a with the associated data source. 但是，如果您设置了 的 属性，则可以创建一个 对象以自动为单表更新生成 SQL 语句。However, you can create an object to automatically generate SQL statements for single-table updates if you set the property of the . 然后，会生成未设置的任何其他 SQL 语句。Then, any additional SQL statements that you do not set are generated by the . 只要设置 属性， 就会将自身注册为 事件的侦听器。The registers itself as a listener for events whenever you set the property. 一次只能将一个 或 对象彼此关联。You can only associate one or object with each other at one time. 若要生成 INSERT、UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句， 使用 属性自动检索所需的元数据集。To generate INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements, the uses the property to retrieve a required set of metadata automatically. 如果在检索元数据后更改 （例如，在第一次更新之后），则应调用 方法来更新元数据。If you change the after the metadata is retrieved, such as after the first update, you should call the method to update the metadata. 还使用 引用的 、和 属性。The also uses the , , and properties referenced by the . 如果修改了其中一个或多个属性，则用户应调用 ; 如果 本身已被替换，则为。The user should call if one or more of these properties are modified, or if the itself is replaced. 否则，、和 属性保留其以前的值。Otherwise the , , and properties retain their previous values. 如果调用 ，则 会与 解除关联，不再使用生成的命令。If you call , the is disassociated from the , and the generated commands are no longer used. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 ，以及 和 从数据源中选择行。The following example uses the , along and , to select rows from a data source. 该示例传递了一个初始化的 、一个连接字符串、一个 SQL SELECT 语句的查询字符串以及一个作为数据源表名称的字符串。The example is passed an initialized , a connection string, a query string that is an SQL SELECT statement, and a string that is the name of the data source table. 然后，该示例创建一个 。The example then creates an . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommandBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommandBuilder/CS/mysample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommandBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommandBuilder/VB/mysample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将自身注册为此属性中指定的 生成的 事件的侦听器。The registers itself as a listener for events that are generated by the specified in this property. 创建新的实例时，将释放与此 相关联的任何现有 。When you create a new instance , any existing associated with this is released.

summary.span: 获取或设置为其自动生成 SQL 语句的 对象。

span.span: Gets or sets an object for which SQL statements are automatically generated.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将自身注册为此属性中指定的 生成的 事件的侦听器。The registers itself as a listener for events that are generated by the specified in this property. 创建新的实例时，将释放与此 相关联的任何现有 。When you create a new instance , any existing associated with this is released.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void DeriveParameters(class System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand command) cil managed
Public Shared Sub DeriveParameters (command As OleDbCommand)

param.name: command
param.span: 引用将从其中导出参数信息的存储过程的 。

span.span: The referencing the stored procedure from which the parameter information is to be derived.

param.span: 将派生参数添加到 的 集合中。

span.span: The derived parameters are added to the collection of the .

summary.span: 从在 中指定的存储过程中检索参数信息并填充指定的 对象的 集合。

span.span: Retrieves parameter information from the stored procedure specified in the and populates the collection of the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆盖 的任何现有参数信息。 overwrites any existing parameter information for the . 要求对数据源进行额外的调用以获取信息。 requires an additional call to the data source to obtain the information. 如果事先知道了参数信息，则通过显式设置信息更有效地填充参数集合。If the parameter information is known in advance, it is more efficient to populate the parameters collection by setting the information explicitly. 只能将 与存储过程一起使用。You can only use with stored procedures. 不能使用 向任意 Transact-sql 语句（如参数化 SELECT 语句）填充 。You cannot use to populate the with arbitrary Transact-SQL statements, such as a parameterized SELECT statement. 有关详细信息，请参阅[配置参数和参数数据类型](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types)。For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types).

exception.span: 基础 OLE DB 提供程序不支持返回存储过程参数信息，命令文本不是有效的存储过程名称，或者指定的 不是 。

span.span: The underlying OLE DB provider does not support returning stored procedure parameter information, the command text is not a valid stored procedure name, or the specified was not .

summary.span: 获取在数据源中执行删除操作所需的自动生成的 对象。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform deletions at the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以使用 方法进行信息性或故障排除，因为它返回要执行的 对象。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您还可以将 用作修改后的命令的基础。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，你可以调用 并修改 值，然后在 上显式设置。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 首次生成 SQL 语句后，如果应用程序以任何方式更改语句，则必须显式调用 。After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则， 仍将使用前一语句中的信息，这可能是不正确的。Otherwise, the will be still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 当应用程序调用 或 时，将首先生成 SQL 语句。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or .

param.name: useColumnsForParameterNames
param.span: 如果为 ，则如有可能，将生成与列名相匹配的参数名称。

span.span: If , generate parameter names matching column names, if it is possible.

param.span: 如果为 ，则生成 @p1、@p2，以此类推。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform deletions at the data source.

returns.span: 自动生成的、执行删除操作所需的 对象。

span.span: The automatically generated object required to perform deletions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以使用 方法进行信息性或故障排除，因为它返回要执行的 对象。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 您还可以将 用作修改后的命令的基础。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，你可以调用 并修改 值，然后在 上显式设置。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 首次生成 SQL 语句后，如果应用程序以任何方式更改语句，则必须显式调用 。After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则， 仍将使用前一语句中的信息，这可能是不正确的。Otherwise, the will be still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. 当应用程序调用 或 时，将首先生成 SQL 语句。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 生成参数名称时，默认行为是使用各种参数 `@p1`、`@p2`等。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use `@p1`, `@p2`, and so on for the various parameters. 传递 `useColumnsForParameterNames` 参数的 `true` 可强制 根据列名生成参数。Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the to generate parameters based on the column names instead. 仅当满足以下条件时，此操作才会成功：This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - 已指定 ，其长度等于或大于生成的参数名称。The has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name. - 生成的参数名称满足在 正则表达式中指定的条件。The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the regular expression. - 指定 。A is specified.

summary.span: 给定了具有正确的目录大小写设置且不带引号的标识符时，返回该标识符的正确的带引号形式。

span.span: Given an unquoted identifier in the correct catalog case, returns the correct quoted form of that identifier.

summary.span: 这包括正确地转义该标识符中的任何嵌入引号。

span.span: This includes correctly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.

span.span: When a connection is passed, causes the managed wrapper to get the quote character from the OLE DB provider.

summary.span: 获取或设置指定其名称包含空格或保留标记等字符的数据库对象（例如，表或列）时使用的开始字符。

span.span: Gets or sets the beginning character or characters to use when specifying database objects (for example, tables or columns) whose names contain characters such as spaces or reserved tokens.
The beginning character or characters to use.
The default is an empty string.

span.span: Gets or sets the ending character or characters to use when specifying database objects (for example, tables or columns) whose names contain characters such as spaces or reserved tokens.
The ending character or characters to use.
The default is an empty string.
